content.eamr: ( ing-0 "2 cups all-purpose flour" )
( ing-1 "2 teaspoons baking soda" )
( ing-2 "1 teaspoon ground cinnamon" )
( ing-3 "2 cups white sugar" )
( ing-4 "1 cup vegetable oil" )
( ing-5 "3 eggs" )
( ing-6 "1 teaspoon vanilla extract" )
( ing-7 "1 cup chopped walnuts" )
( ing-8 "1 (15 ounce) can crushed pineapple, drained" )
( ing-9 "2 cups carrots, grated" )
( ing-10 "1 cup flaked coconut" )
( ing-11 "1/2 cup butter" )
( ing-12 "1 cup white sugar" )
( ing-13 "1/2 cup buttermilk" )
( ing-14 "1 teaspoon vanilla extract" )

content.text: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-0-0 "oven"@11:15 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "350 degrees F"@19:32 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-0-1 "175 degrees C"@34:47 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Sift together the flour, baking soda and cinnamon.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Sift"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the flour"@17:26 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "baking soda"@28:39 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "cinnamon"@44:52 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 4) In a large bowl, combine the sugar and oil until blended.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "combine"@20:27 / AC
		:loc ( tool-4-0 "a large bowl"@6:18 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "the sugar"@28:37 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "oil"@42:45 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-4-0 "until blended"@46:59 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Beat in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-5 "the eggs"@11:19 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:mnr ( "one at a time"@20:33 / OTHER )
	)
	:inform ( ac-5-1 "stir in"@40:47 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-6 "the vanilla"@48:59 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Stir in the flour mixture just until incorporated.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "Stir in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( "the flour mixture"@11:28 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-6-0 "until incorporated"@34:52 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 7) Fold in the pineapple, carrots, coconut and walnuts.
content.eamr:
( inst-7 / R
	:inform ( ac-7-0 "Fold in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-8 "the pineapple"@11:24 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-9 "carrots"@26:33 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-10 "coconut"@35:42 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "walnuts"@47:54 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 9) Bake in the preheated oven for 45 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
content.eamr:
( inst-9 / R
	:inform ( ac-9-0 "Bake"@-1:-1 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-9-0 "the preheated oven"@-1:-1 / TOOL )
		:duration ( dur-9-0 "45 minutes"@-1:-1 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-9-0 "until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean"@-1:-1 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 10) While still warm, poke holes in the cake with a fork.
content.eamr:
( inst-10 / R
	:inform ( ac-10-0 "poke"@22:26 / AC
		:instrument ( tool-10-0 "a fork"@50:56 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( "holes"@27:32 / OTHER )
		:source ( "the cake"@36:44 / FOOD )
		:while ( cond-10-0 "While still warm"@4:20 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 11) For the glaze: In a saucepan, combine butter, sugar, buttermilk and vanilla.
content.eamr:
( inst-11 / R
	:inform ( ac-11-0 "combine"@34:41 / AC
		:loc ( tool-11-0 "a saucepan"@22:32 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( ing-11 "butter"@42:48 / FOOD )
		:subtask ( "the glaze"@8:17 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-12 "sugar"@50:55 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-13 "buttermilk"@57:67 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-14 "vanilla"@72:79 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 12) Bring mixture to a boil over medium heat, then reduce heat and cook for 5 minutes.
13) Pour glaze over warm cake, then allow to cool completely.
